definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I like the small electric blue notes of grape hyacinths.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢葡萄风信子的小的电的忧郁音符。

sentences.english: The bluebells had cascaded on to the ground.
You gave me hyacinths first a year ago;
sentences.chinese: 一年前你把风信子初次给我作为奖赏。

sentences.english: Why do you only love that a hyacinth?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么只爱那一朵风信子呢？

sentences.english: I'll love you 'til the bluebells forget to bloom.
sentences.chinese: 我将一直爱你，直至风信子忘了绽放。

sentences.english: Thats true for hyacinths and homo sapiens, walruses and raz, which is a fish. A switch hitting fiSh.
sentences.chinese: 对于风信子，智人，海象和隆头鱼来说都是如此。

sentences.english: The broom blooms when the bluebells bloom.
sentences.chinese: 野风信子开花时金雀花也开花了。

sentences.english: They called me the hyacinth girl.
sentences.chinese: 他们叫我做风信子女郎。

sentences.english: They called me the hyacinth girl.
It and all other hyacinth, what are the different place?
sentences.chinese: 它和其他所有的风信子有什么不同的地方吗？

sentences.english: It was as if he had hacked with his thick boots at a clump of bluebells.
sentences.chinese: 仿佛他用自己的厚靴子无情地践踏了一丛野风信子。

sentences.english: Yet when we came back, late, from the Hyacinth garden.
sentences.chinese: 而当我们回来，晚了，走出风信子花园。

sentences.english: An azured harebell like her veins.
sentences.chinese: 像她的脉管一样蓝的风信子。

sentences.english: Under the trees to the left of him the ground was misty with bluebells.
sentences.chinese: 左边的树下，密匝匝开满了风信子。

sentences.english: Grape hyacinthus, also named grape lily, is a perennial herbaceous flower.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄风信子别名葡萄百合，为多年生草本球根花卉。

sentences.english: To this day the flower is called the hyacinth .
sentences.chinese: 这就是今天我们所称的“风信子”。

definition: narcissus/daffodil/legendary aquatic immortal/refers to those buried at sea/person who wanders abroad and does not return
